isis.stitle: SINGLE REDUCTION, TANDEM AXLE: INTERNATIONAL - INSTALL - CARRIER ASSEMBLY INTO AXLE HOUSING

step1.para: Thoroughly clean the inside of the carrier housing and inspect the housing mounting surface for nicks and general cleanliness. Stone the surface if necessary to remove burrs or nicks.
Apply a 1/8 inch bead of Loctite 518 gasket eliminator onto the axle housing carrier mounting flange and around each bolt hole ( Figure 55).
Thread 2 studs into housing 180° apart to aid installation of the carrier assembly. This will also eliminate rotating carrier assembly after it is in contact with the gasket material.
Install carrier into housing. Clean mounting bolts, and coat with Loctite #277 (red), or its equivalent, and install. Tighten evenly in a cross pattern. Refer to the TORQUE CHART.
Allow one hour cure time for gasket material before adding hypoid lubricant.
Remove old axle flange gasket and clean mating surfaces of hub and axle flange.
Install axle shaft. Refer to the TORQUE CHART for proper torque specifications of axle flange nuts.

On forward axle, clean mating surfaces on axle housing and output shaft bearing retainer. Apply a 1/16" bead of Loctite 518 gasket eliminator on housing flange and around bolt holes ( Figure 56). Install output shaft. Tighten mounting bolts evenly to 30 to 40 ft-lbs. (41 to 55 N•m).
Install drive shafts. Connect air line to power divider control on forward axle assembly.
Clean and install drain plug. Tighten to 35 to 45 ft-lbs. (47 to 61 N•m). Fill unit to proper level with hypoid gear lubricant.
